message: I propose dividing the money in a 3:1 ratio. This ensures a fair distribution considering the decreasing value of money with each round.
I think this is a good starting point, let's see if we can find a better deal
Considering the decrease in money value, I propose a more equitable split of 60:40. This balances our gains while acknowledging the inflationary effect on future rounds.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve a slightly better deal considering the decreasing value of money
